snippet: The mayor of Baltimore asked the City Council to confirm Kevin Davis, the interim police commissioner, as the permanent replacement for the official fired after riots in April.
abstract: Baltimore Mayor Stephanie Rawlings-Blake requests permanent appointment of interim police commissioner Kevin Davis, whose predecessor was fired after riots protesting death of Freddie Gray, unarmed black man injured in police custody.
lead_paragraph: The mayor of Baltimore asked the City Council to confirm Kevin Davis, the interim police commissioner, as the permanent replacement for the official fired after riots in April.

headline.main: Maryland: Acting Police Commissioner in Baltimore May Retain Job
headline.print_headline: Maryland: Acting Police Commissioner May Retain Job
